price: نو كوډګر په سجده پرېوتل، وېلې موږ د هارون او موسىٰ -علیهما السلام- رب ومنلو.
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
